remarks: Weak deduction theorem for eliminating a hypothesis with 3 class variables.  See comments in ~ dedth2v .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 28-Jul-2009.)
statement:
dedth3v.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , D ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
dedth3v.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , B , R ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
dedth3v.3 $e |- ( C = if ( ph , C , S ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
dedth3v.4 $e |- ta $.
dedth3v $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
